Files Headings

_baseReduce.js

The base implementation of _.reduce and _.reduceRight, without support for iteratee shorthands, which iterates over collection using eachFunc.

Params
collection Array Object The collection to iterate over.
iteratee Function The function invoked per iteration.
accumulator The initial value.
initAccum boolean Specify using the first or last element of collection as the initial value.
eachFunc Function The function to iterate over collection. 
function baseReduce(collection, iteratee, accumulator, initAccum, eachFunc) {
  eachFunc(collection, function(value, index, collection) {
    accumulator = initAccum
      ? (initAccum = false, value)
      : iteratee(accumulator, value, index, collection);
  });
  return accumulator;
}

module.exports = baseReduce;
